To only enable the middleware in production, add something like this to settings_production:
MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES = (
    'YOUR_APP.middleware.HTTPSMiddleware',
) + MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES
This assumes you're using settings as suggested here: http://www.ep.io/docs/quickstart/django/#turning-debug-off
